# Dancing with the Aurora
## Scripture
"The Lord has made everything for its own purpose, even the darkness and light." - Ecclesiastes 3:1, adapted from Psalm 104:24 and Ecclesiastes 3:1, focusing on the northern lights as a display of God's creativity.

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the breathtaking display of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of God's incredible creativity and power. The dancing colors and swirling patterns of the aurora borealis are a testament to the beauty and wonder of our celestial world. Just as the Northern Lights illuminate the night sky, God's presence illuminates our lives, guiding us through times of darkness and uncertainty. The ever-changing displays of the aurora remind us that our lives are also dynamic and constantly evolving, with each season bringing new opportunities and challenges.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the beauty of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of your infinite creativity and power. Help us to trust in your guidance and illumination, even in the darkest of times. May we dance with joy and wonder, knowing that you are always with us, leading us through the ever-changing seasons of our lives. Fill our hearts with awe and reverence for your creation, and may we reflect your beauty and light to a world in need. Amen.
